column1: Little Goat Diner////There is always a wait
column2: but you can make it fun at Little Goat! There is a coffee/bread area you can get snacks or good coffee. Once you are seated
column3: the menu has endless amazing choices. When in season
column4: I highly suggest the blueberry pancakes & the burrito. The pancakes are incredible
column5: best blueberry pancakes I can say I've ever ever had. The chef of this place is incredible
column6: I PROMISE it's worth the wait!
